Text: Anybody care to comment on quality?
The quality is almost perfect. A good quality though. It just has a few blurred out watermarks on the screen but they are hardly noticeable.

The quality is much better than expected. It stays the same through the whole movie. The only thing to say is that a barely visible watermark popping on the screen for 5 seconds and then disappear, for something like every 15-20 minutes which is not a big deal. 

I'm not a big fan of DVDscr because of the quality but this torrent suprised me. If you don't want to wait until someone gets a hold on to the Bluray then this is the right torrent. 

Enjoy, and remember... This is not bluray, so do not expect that kind of quality.

M: 8/10
@Arkener - not that I doubt the quality of the streamable movie, but a site that requires you to enter credit card details in order to watch something seems dodgy to me.
